description: Built an integrated stimulator–sensor–control system and modular async API, adding patient-feedback visualization to improve outcomes.

Architected an LLM accelerator and multi-agent test/auto-fix system, shipping a chain-based codebase that improved efficiency 30%.
Built a Java+JDBC backend and streamlined Agile on JIRA, reducing errors 25% and improving client communication.
